Package com.example.ex_motricite

Class PatientDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex_motricite.PatientDAO
public class PatientDAO extends Object
The PatientDAO class represents a DAO (Data Access Object) for patients.

This class is used to retrieve patient data from a database. It provides methods to retrieve, add, delete, and update patient data in the database.

Author: Ferreria, Rgouaud Version: 1.0

  • Method Details

    • getPatient

      public Patient getPatient(long idPatient)
      Retrieves a patient from the database based on the provided patient ID.
      Parameters:
      idPatient - The ID of the patient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Patient object representing the retrieved patient; null if not found.

    • addPatient

      public void addPatient(Patient patient)
      Adds a new patient to the database.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient object representing the patient to be added.

    • delPatient

      public void delPatient(Patient patient)
      Deletes a patient from the database.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient object representing the patient to be deleted.

    • getPatients

      public ArrayList<Patient> getPatients()
      Retrieves a list of all patients from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList<Patient> containing all patients in the database.

    • updatePatient

      public void updatePatient(Patient patient)
      Updates an existing patient in the database.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient object representing the updated patient information.

    • cursorToPatientArrayList

      private ArrayList<Patient> cursorToPatientArrayList(android.database.Cursor cursor)
      Converts a database cursor to an ArrayList<Patient>.
      Parameters:
      cursor - The database cursor containing patient data.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList<Patient> containing patient objects.
